title: The Giant Caverns
data:
**The Giant Caverns** is a single-level [dungeon branch](/wiki/Dungeon_branch "Dungeon branch") that appears in [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM") and [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"). It is accessed by a [stairway](/wiki/Stair "Stair") down located between levels 32 and 35.

## Map

                  ----------|    |---|  
                  |.........|    |...|         |---------|  
  -----------|    |.........|    |.[<](/wiki/Staircase "Staircase").|         |.........|  
  |..........|    |.........|    |...|         |.........|  
  |..........|   |----[+](/wiki/Door "Door")------------[+](/wiki/Door "Door")----------------[+](/wiki/Door "Door")------|  
  |..........|   |.........................................|  
  |..........|   |.........................................|-----------|  
  |--|.......|   |----[+](/wiki/Door "Door")------[+](/wiki/Door "Door")----------------[+](/wiki/Door "Door")-----------[+](/wiki/Door "Door")|...........|  
     |---[+](/wiki/Door "Door")--------.......|...........|....|......|    |................|  
     |...................|...........|....|......|    |................|  
     |...................|-----------|....|......|    |................|  
     |[\\](/wiki/Throne "Throne")..................[S](/wiki/Secret_door "Secret door")..........[(](/wiki/Chest "Chest")|....|......|    |................|  
     |...................|-------------[+](/wiki/Door "Door")--|......|    |----------------|  
     |-------[+](/wiki/Door "Door")-----------|......|................|  
         |...............|......|................|  
         |...............[+](/wiki/Door "Door")......|................|  
         |...............|-----------------------|  
         |...............|  
         |---------------|

The ( mark indicates "the king's hidden treasure," composed of a chest, a random amount of gold, five random gems, two random amulets, and three other random objects. [The Largest Giant](/wiki/The_Largest_Giant "The Largest Giant") is on the throne; the level also contains 20 giants, seven random H, eight random O, four random T, ten random items, and four random traps.

## See also

- [Special level (SLASH'EM)](/wiki/Special_level_\(SLASH%27EM\) "Special level (SLASH'EM)")

## Reference

html:
The Giant Caverns

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search

The Giant Caverns is a single-level dungeon branch that appears in SLASH'EM, SlashTHEM and Hack'EM. It is accessed by a stairway down located between levels 32 and 35.

Map

                  ----------|    |---|
                  |.........|    |...|         |---------|
  -----------|    |.........|    |.<.|         |.........|
  |..........|    |.........|    |...|         |.........|
  |..........|   |----+------------+----------------+------|
  |..........|   |.........................................|
  |..........|   |.........................................|-----------|
  |--|.......|   |----+------+----------------+-----------+|...........|
     |---+--------.......|...........|....|......|    |................|
     |...................|...........|....|......|    |................|
     |...................|-----------|....|......|    |................|
     |\..................S..........(|....|......|    |................|
     |...................|-------------+--|......|    |----------------|
     |-------+-----------|......|................|
         |...............|......|................|
         |...............+......|................|
         |...............|-----------------------|
         |...............|
         |---------------|

The ( mark indicates "the king's hidden treasure," composed of a chest, a random amount of gold, five random gems, two random amulets, and three other random objects. The Largest Giant is on the throne; the level also contains 20 giants, seven random H, eight random O, four random T, ten random items, and four random traps.

See also

  • Special level (SLASH'EM)
